on reading compounds: 沿海【エンカイ】coast, shore, inshore, coastal waters
沿海州【エンカイシュウ】(Russian) maritime provinces
kun reading compounds: 沿う【そう】to run along, to run beside, to stick to (a line), to follow (a policy, plan, etc.), to act in accordance with, to align with, to meet (wishes, expectations, etc.), to satisfy, to comply with, to live up to
